text: Tharowangka: A Piyaratiyaya Mi so Allah, go so (Qur-an) Initoron Rukami go so Initoron ko Ibrahim, go so Ismail, go so Ishaq, go so Yaqoub, go so manga Moriran a tao, goso inibugai ko Musa, go so Isa, go so manga Nabi, a pho-on ko Kadnan Niran: Da-a imbida Ami Kiran a isa bo, go Sukami na Ron Kami Mimbayorantang
